GSP28mjnya01u:1286: yathā prayoktṝṇāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ bhede 'pyekaikasya puruṣasya bahukṛtva uccāraṇabhede 'pi ' ta evāmī varṇāḥ ' iti pratyabhijñānādvarṇaikyam /
GSP28mjnya01u:1291: anyathā 'so 'yaṃ devadattaḥ ' iti pratyabhijñātaṃ devadattaikyamapi deśādibhedamātreṇāpodyeta /
GSP28mjnya01u:1296: svaruyūpāhavanīyāndiśabdānāṃ tadarthānāṃ cālaukikatve 'pi prasiddhapadasamabhivyāhārādva yuptattiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP28mjnya01u:1300: tasmādya eva laukikāḥ padapadārthāsta eva vaidikāḥ // MJaiNyC_1,2.31-32 //
GSP28mjnya01u:1314: kiñca śullavyaktau vyutpanno gośabdaḥ kṛṣṇavyaktau prayujyamānaḥ svārthe vyabhicaret /
GSP28mjnya01u:1316: evaṃ tarhi vyutpattikāle sā vyaktirākṛtyopalakṣyatāmiti prāpte -
GSP28mjnya01u:1318: kiñca gośabda uccārite vyaktivādinaḥ saṃśayo bhavet /
GSP28mjnya01u:1328: iti śrīmādhavīye jaiminīyanyāyamālāvistare prathamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
GSP28mjnya01u:1331: uktaṃ samāmnāyaidam arthyaṃ tasmāt sarvaṃ tadarthaṃ syāt / Jaim_1,4.1 /
GSP28mjnya01u:1338: nāmatvenānvayo vākye vakṣyate 'taḥ pramaiva tat // MJaiNy_1,4.2 // @------------------
GSP28mjnya01u:1361: yadyapi liṅpratyayena samānapadopātto yajidhātvarthaḥ karaṇam tathāpi tasya yajernāmatvenodbhidādipadamanveti /
GSP28mjnya01u:1365: api vā nāmadheyaṃ syād yad utpattāv apūrvam avidhāyakatvāt / Jaim_1,4.2 /
GSP28mjnya01u:1371: “udbhidā yajeta paśukāmaḥ“ityatra tṛtīyāntenodbhitpadena yor'tho vivakṣitaḥ so 'yaṃ yāge kaścidguṇaḥ syāt /
GSP28mjnya01u:1377: ' udbhidyate bhūmiranena ' iti vyutpattyā khanitravācyasau śabdaḥ /
GSP28mjnya01u:1378: na cātra paśuphalakaḥ kaścidyāgo vidhīyata iti vācyam /
GSP28mjnya01u:1382: yadi“camasenāpaḥ praṇayet“iti vihitaṃ prakṛtamapāṃ praṇayanamāśritya godohanaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28mjnya01u:1383: tarhyatrāpi“jyotiṣṭomena yajeta ' iti vihitaṃ prakṛtaṃ jyotiṣṭomamāśritya khanitraṃ vidhīyatām /
GSP28mjnya01u:1385: brūmaḥ- “paśukāmo yajeta“ityasya padadvayasyāyamarthaḥ-- ' paśurupaṃ phalaṃ yāgena kuryāt ' iti /
GSP28mjnya01u:1386: tatra 'kena yāgena' ityapekṣāyām ' udbhidā ' iti tṛtīyāntaṃ padaṃ yāganāmatvenānveti /
GSP28mjnya01u:1388: evamapi guṇavidhināmadheyatvayoḥ śabdanirvacanasāmyānna nirṇaya iti cet /
GSP28mjnya01u:1391: 'udbhinnāmakena yāgena phalaṃ kuryāt ' ityukte sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ labhyate /
GSP28mjnya01u:1392: guṇatve tu ' khanitreṇa sādhyo yo yāgaḥ,
GSP28mjnya01u:1394: yadi 'khanitravatā yāgena ' iti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ yojyeta tadā matvarthalakṣaṇā prasajyeta /
GSP28mjnya01u:1396: ' dadhnā juhoti ' ' vrīhibhiryajeta ' ityādiṣu dravyaviśeṣe dadhyādiśabdānāmatyantarūḍhatayā yāganāmatvāsaṃbhavādagatyā guṇatvamāśritam /
GSP28mjnya01u:1397: ' somena yajeta ' ityatrāpi ' aprasiddhārthanāmadheyatvakalpanāto varaṃ prasiddhārthadvāreṇa
GSP28mjnya01u:1398: lakṣaṇāśrayaṇam ' ityabhipretya ' somadravyavatā yāgena ' iti matvarthalakṣaṇā svīkṛtā /
GSP28mjnya01u:1400: prayojanaṃ tu nāmnaḥ sarvatra vyavahāra eva /
GSP28mjnya01u:1401: na hyantareṇa nāmadheyamṛtvigvaraṇādiṣu ' anenāhaṃ yakṣye ' ityākhyānopāyo laghuḥ kaścidasti /
GSP28mjnya01u:1417: yaccitrayā yajeteti tadguṇo nāma vā bhavet /
GSP28mjnya01u:1425: tathā sati“agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabheta“iti vihitaṃ paśuyāgamātraṃ ' yajeta ' ityanena padenānūdya tasminpaśau citratvastrītve guṇau vidhīyete iti prāpte ---
GSP28mjnya01u:1426: brūmaḥ - citratvaṃ strītvaṃ ceti dvāvetau guṇau /
GSP28mjnya01u:1431: atha vākyabhedapirahārāya guṇadvayāvīśīṣṭa paśudravyarūpaṃ kārakaṃ vidhīyate tadā gauravaṃ syāt /
GSP28mjnya01u:1439: tatsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ prājāpatyam ' iti dadhyādīni vicitrāṇi pradeyadravyāṇi ṣaḍāmnātāni /
GSP28mjnya01u:1442: utpannasya tasya yāgasya ' citrayā yajeta paśukāmaḥ ' ityetatphalavākyam /
GSP28mjnya01u:1457: jyotiṣṭomasya prātaḥ savanānuṣṭhāne teṣu triṣuṃ sūkteṣu gāyatraṃ sāma gātavyam /
GSP28mjnya01u:1458: tadidaṃ sūktatrayagānasādhyaṃ stotraṃ bahiṣpavamānamityucyate tatrāvasthitānāmṛcāṃ pavamānārthatvāt /
GSP28mjnya01u:1460: na khalbidaṃ stotramitarastotravatsadonāmakasya maṇḍapasya madhya audumbaryāḥ stambaśākhāyāḥ saṃnidhau prayujyate,
GSP28mjnya01u:1462: tasya ca bahiṣpavamānasya trivṛnnāmakaḥ stomo bhavati /
GSP28mjnya01u:1463: tasya ca stomasya vidhāyakaṃ brāhmaṇavākkayamevamāmnāyate ---“tisṛbhyo hiṃ karoti sa prathamayā,
GSP28mjnya01u:1464: tisṛmyo hiṃ karoti sa madhyamayā tisṛbhyo hiṃ karoti sa uttamayā,
GSP28mjnya01u:1467: tatra prathame paryāye - triṣu sūkteṣvādyāstustra kracaḥ ,
GSP28mjnya01u:1475: tayoḥ parivartinyevamāmnāyate -“tisṛbhyo hiṃ karoti sa parācībhiḥ,
GSP28mjnya01u:1480: kulāyinyevamāmnāyate --“tisṛbhyo hiṃ karoti sa parācībhistisṛbhyo hiṃ karoti,
GSP28mjnya01u:1484: tisṛbhyo hiṃ karoti yottamā sā prathamā,
GSP28mjnya01u:1494: uttarāgranthe bahiṣpavamānasūktebhyastribhya ūrdhve catvāri sūktānyāmnātāni --“agna ā yāhi vītaye“ityādyaṃ sūktam /
GSP28mjnya01u:1498: tānyetāni prātaḥ savane gāyatrasāmnā gīyamānāni catvāryājyastotrāṇītyucyante /
GSP28mjnya01u:1502: tasya stomasya viṣṭutirevamāmnāyate -“pañcabhyo hiṃ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā sa ekayā pañcabhyo hiṃ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā,
GSP28mjnya01u:1503: pañcabhyo hiṃ karoti sa ekayā sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ“iti /
GSP28mjnya01u:1509: uktebhyaścaturbhyaḥ sūktebhya ūrdhvamuttarāgranthe trīṇi mādhyandinapavamānasūktānyāmnāya tata ūrdhve catvāri sūktānyāmnātāni - teṣu“abhi tvā śūra nonuma” -ityādyam ,
GSP28mjnya01u:1516: tasya stomasya viṣṭutirevamāmnāyate -“pañcabhyo hiṃ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā sa ekayā,
GSP28mjnya01u:1517: pañcabhyo hiṃ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā sa ekayā,
GSP28mjnya01u:1518: pañcabhyo hiṃ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā,
GSP28mjnya01u:1519: saptabhyo hiṃ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ“iti /
GSP28mjnya01u:1523: atra triṣvapi vākyeṣu trivṛtpañcadaśasaptadaśaśabdā guṇavidhāyakatvena saṃmatāḥ /
GSP28mjnya01u:1524: yadi bahiṣpavamānājyapṛṣṭhaśabdā api guṇavidhāyakāḥ syustadā pratyudāharaṇam /
GSP28mjnya01u:1535: guṇo vidheyo nāmatve rupaṃ na syātkṣaradghṛte // MJaiNy_1,4.9 //
GSP28mjnya01u:1540: nāsādhite hi dhātvarthe karaṇatvaṃ tato 'sya sā /
GSP28mjnya01u:1541: sādhyatāṃ vakti saṃskāro naivā'śaṅkyaḥ kriyātvataḥ // MJaiNy_1,4.12 // @------------------
GSP28mjnya01u:1542: “agnihotraṃ juhoti” “āghāramāghārayati“ityatrāgnihotraśabdasya kamanāmatve dravyadevatayorabhāvādyāgasya svarupameva na sidhyet /
GSP28mjnya01u:1550: sūryo jyotirjyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāheti prātaḥ“iti vihitena mantreṇa prāptatvāddevatā na vidheyā /
GSP28mjnya01u:1551: tato 'gnisūryadevatākasya sāyaṃprātaḥ kālayorniyamenānuṣṭheyasya karmaṇaḥ ' agnihotram ' iti yaugikaṃ nāmadheyam /
GSP28mjnya01u:1554: 'yasminkarmāṇi nairṛtīṃ diśamārabhyaiśānīṃ diśamavadhiṃ kṛtvā saṃtatyā ghṛtaṃ kṣāryate ' tasya karmaṇa etaṃnnāma /
GSP28mjnya01u:1555: nanu nāmadheyatve sati“udbhidā yajeta” “jyotiṣṭomena yajeta“ityādāviva dhātvarthena
GSP28mjnya01u:1556: karaṇena sāmānādhikaraṇyāya 'agnihotreṇa juhoti ' 'āghāreṇā'ghārayati ' iti tṛtīyayā bhavitavyam /
GSP28mjnya01u:1558: anuṣṭhānādūrdhve cātvarthasya siddhatvākāreṇa karaṇatve 'pi tataḥ pūrve sādhyatvākāraṃ vaktum 'agnihotram ' ' āghāram ' iti dvitīyāyā yuktatvāt
GSP28mjnya01u:1559: na cātra dvitīyānusāreṇa 'vrīhīnprokṣati ' itrayadāvidya saṃskāraḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ /
GSP28mjnya01u:1568: vidhīyate pakṣirūpo nāma vā tasya karmaṇaḥ // MJaiNy_1,4.13 //
GSP28mjnya01u:1574: tataḥ somayāge nityaṃ somadravyaṃ bādhitvā somasya sthāne pakṣidravyarūpo guṇaḥ kāmyo vidhīyate /
GSP28mjnya01u:1575: tathā sati śyena śabdasya pakṣiṇi lokasiddhā rūḍhiranugṛhyate /
GSP28mjnya01u:1576: na ca guṇavidhitve citrāyāmiva vākyabheda āpādayituṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP28mjnya01u:1579: evamayaṃ dviṣantaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ nipatyā'datte yamabhicarati śyenena“iti vākyenokta upamānopameyabhāvaḥ pakṣiṇyekasminna yujyate /
GSP28mjnya01u:1580: tasmātpakṣiṇa upamānasya guṇa upameye karmaṇyastīti śyevaśabdasyābhicārakarmanāmatvam /
GSP28mjnya01u:1583: “yathā saṃdaṃśena durādānamādatte” “yathā gāvo gopāyanti“iti vākyaśeṣābhyāmupamānopameyabhāvābhidhānāt // MJaiNyC_1,4.13-15 //
GSP28mjnya01u:1586: nāmadheye guṇaśruteḥ syād vidhānam iti cet / Jaim_1,4.6 /
GSP28mjnya01u:1593: trikadvayaṃ viruddhaṃ syāttantratāyāṃ phalaṃ prati // MJaiNy_1,4.16 //
GSP28mjnya01u:1596: tyaktvā tantraṃ tadāvṛttau vākyaṃ bhidyate tena saḥ /
GSP28mjnya01u:1603: nanu guṇatve ' vājapeyaguṇavatā yāgena svārājaṃ bhāvayet ' iti matvarthalakṣaṇā prasajyeta /
GSP28mjnya01u:1607: itvākhyātasya vājapeyaguṇe svārājyaphale ca tantreṇa saṃbandhāṅgīkārāt /
GSP28mjnya01u:1610: nanu guṇasaṃbandhe sati vājapeyaguṇena yāgaṃ kuryāt,
GSP28mjnya01u:1612: phalasaṃbandhe tu ' yāgena svārājyaṃ saṃpādayet ' iti karaṇakārakatvam /
GSP28mjnya01u:1620: na khalu tatra karmatvasya karaṇatvasya vā sākṣādabhidhāyikā kācidasādhāraṇī vibhaktiḥ śrūyate /
GSP28mjnya01u:1621: ataḥ sādhāraṇasya yajerubhābhyāṃ yugapatsaṃbandhe sita yathocitasaṃbandhaviśeṣaḥ paryavasyati /
GSP28mjnya01u:1622: evaṃ tantreṇa saṃbandhāṅgīkāre ' vājapeyadravyeṇa yāgaṃ kuryāt ' ityarthasya lamyamānatvādguṇavidhitve 'pi nāsti matvarthalakṣaṇā /
GSP28mjnya01u:1624: tarhi tānyapi vākyānyatrodāhṛtya tadīyaḥ siddhāntaḥ punarākṣipyatāmiti prāpte --
GSP28mjnya01u:1642: evaṃ sati phalatatsādhanayoḥ svārājyayāgayoḥ svabhāvaparyālocanāyāṃ yathā phalasyoddeśyatvāditrikaṃ
GSP28mjnya01u:1643: yāgasyopādeyatvāditrikaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate tathā yāgasya vājapeyasya ca sādhyasādhanabhāvāparyālocanāyāṃ
GSP28mjnya01u:1646: tato yāgasya phaladravyābhyāṃ yugapatsaṃbandhe sati viruddhaṃ trikadvayamāpadyate /
GSP28mjnya01u:1656: tadguṇās tu vidhāyer annavibhāgād vidhānārthe na ced anyena śiṣṭāḥ / Jaim_1,4.9 /
GSP28mjnya01u:1664: tatra yathāgnihotraśabdaḥ ' agnaye hotramatra ' ityamuparthe nimittīkṛtya karmanāmadheyam,
GSP28mjnya01u:1668: agnihotre tu“agnirjyotirjyotiragniḥ svāheti sāyaṃ juhoti“ityanena vacanena vihito mantraḥ pratyakṣavihita iti māntravarṇikī devatā labhyate
GSP28mjnya01u:1673: karmaṇo 'prāptatvena guṇadvayaviśiṣṭasya karmaṇa ekena vākyena vidhānāt /
GSP28mjnya01u:1677: yadāgneya iti proktaṃ na mānaṃ vidhyasaṃbhavāt /
GSP28mjnya01u:1678: iti cenna viśiṣṭārthavidhau satyapramā kutaḥ // MJaiNy_1,4.21 // @------------------
GSP28mjnya01u:1679: udāhṛtavākye devatārāhityaprasaṅgena nāmatvābhāvādguṇayorvidhau vākkayabhedāñca vidhyasaṃbhavādaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP28mjnya01u:1686: jātyarthā vā śāstrarūḍheste syuḥ saṃskāravācinaḥ // MJaiNy_1,4.22 //
GSP28mjnya01u:1687: jātiṃ tyaktvā na saṃskāre prayuktā lokavedayoḥ /
GSP28mjnya01u:1689: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate -“barhirlunāti” “ājyaṃ vilāpayati” “puroḍāśaṃ paryāgni karoti” iti /
GSP28mjnya01u:1690: atra barhirādiśabdānāṃ śāstre sarvartra saṃskṛteṣu tṛṇādiṣu prayogāt,
GSP28mjnya01u:1696: tatra tatra jātiḥ ' ityasyā vyāpterloke vede ca nāsti vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP28mjnya01u:1698: kvaciddeśaviśeṣe laukikavyavahāro jātimātramupajīvya vinā saṃskāraṃ te śabdāḥ prayujyante - ' barhirādāya gāvo gatāḥ ' iti,
GSP28mjnya01u:1700: ' puroḍāśena me mātā prahelakaṃ dadāti ' iti ca /
GSP28mjnya01u:1702: prayojanaṃ tu“barhiṣā yūpāvaṭamavastṛṇāti“ityatra vinā saṃskāreṇa staraṇasiddhiḥ // MJaiNyC_1,4.22-23 //
GSP28mjnya01u:1718: kutaḥ- sarveṣu vaidikaprayogapradeśeṣu saṃskṛtānāmevāpāṃ prokṣaṇīśabdenocyamānatvādityekaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP28mjnya01u:1719: loke jalakrīḍāyāṃ ' prokṣaṇībhirudvejitāḥ smaḥ ' ityasaṃskṛtāsvapsu prayogādvarhirādiśabdavajjātau rūḍhatvādudakatvajātiḥ pravṛttinimittam /
GSP28mjnya01u:1720: na ca ' prakarṣeṇokṣyata ābhiḥ ' iti yogo 'tra śaṅkanīyaḥ /
GSP28mjnya01u:1727: udakajātau prokṣaṇī śabdasya vṛddhavya vahāre pūrvamakḷptatvenetaḥ paraṃ śakteḥ kalpanīyatvāt /
GSP28mjnya01u:1743: laukikanirmanthanena ciranirmanthanena ca janyaṃ vārayituṃ yogarūḍhiḥ paṅkajādivadāśrayaṇīyā /
GSP28mjnya01u:1748: yathā purāṇamūtamayorghṛtayornavanītajanyatve samāne 'pi yogarūḍhyā nūtanameva ' nāvanītam ' iti vyavahriyate tadvat // MJaiNyC_1,4.27 //
GSP28mjnya01u:1752: na vā prakaraṇāt pratyakṣavidhānāc ca na hi prakaraṇaṃ dravyasya / Jaim_1,4.14 /
GSP28mjnya01u:1757: vaiśvadeveti śabdokto guṇaḥ saṃghasya nāma vā // MJaiNy_1,4.28 //
GSP28mjnya01u:1762: ijyante 'tra yajante vā viśve devā itīdṛśī /
GSP28mjnya01u:1768: teṣu prathame parvaṇyaṣṭau yāgā vihitāḥ --- āgneyamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati,
GSP28mjnya01u:1777: tatrā'gneyādīnyāgān ' yajeta ' ityanūdya vaiśvadevaśabdena devatārūpo guṇasteṣu vidhīyate /
GSP28mjnya01u:1783: vidhiranarthakaḥ syāt -- tasmāt ' guṇavidhiḥ ' -- iti prāpte - ' brūmaḥ- utpattivākyairvihitānāgneyādīnaṣṭau
GSP28mjnya01u:1786: 'prācīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajeta ' ityādiṣu vaiśvadevaśabdenaikenaivāṣṭānāṃ saṃghasya vyavahartavyatvāt /
GSP28mjnya01u:1787: nāmapravṛttinimittabhūtā niruktirdvidhā - āmikṣāyāge viśveṣāṃ devānāmijyamānatayā tatsahacaritārthānāṃ sarveṣāṃ chatrinyāyena vaiśvadevatvam
GSP28mjnya01u:1788: athavā ' viśve devā aṣṭānāṃ kartāraḥ ' iti vaiśvadevatvam /
GSP28mjnya01u:1803: guṇasya tu vidhānārthe tadguṇāḥ prayoge syur anarthakā na hi taṃ pratyarthavattāsti / Jaim_1,4.18 /
GSP28mjnya01u:1807: ānarthakyād akāraṇaṃ kartur hi kāraṇāni guṇārtho hi vidhīyate / Jaim_1,4.22 /
GSP28mjnya01u:1810: śrutamaṣṭākapālādi tadguṇo nāma vā stutiḥ // MJaiNy_1,4.33 //
GSP28mjnya01u:1812: dravyaṃ dravyāntare no cedguṇastarhi phale tvasau // MJaiNy_1,4.34 //
GSP28mjnya01u:1815: kāmyeṣṭikāṇḍe śrūyate -“vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapetputre jāte” “yadaṣṭākapālo bhavati gāyatryaivainaṃ brahmavarcasena punāti,
GSP28mjnya01u:1820: yasmiñjāta etāmiṣṭiṃ nirvapati pūta eva sa tejasvyannāda indrīyāvī paśumānbhavati“iti /
GSP28mjnya01u:1822: iṣṭi vidhāyake vākye yeyaṃ dvādaśasaṃkhyā tasyāmaṣṭatvādisaṃkhyānāmantarbhāvāttāḥ saṃkhyā nimittīkṛtyāgnihotraśabdavadaṣṭākapālādiśabdāḥ karmanāmadheyānītyekaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP28mjnya01u:1827: tathā sati dravyasya dravyāntare 'nantarbhāvānnāmadheyasya nimittaṃ nāstīti cet ,
GSP28mjnya01u:1840: uktarītyā guṇatvaṃ nāmatvaṃ ca na saṃbhavati /
GSP28mjnya01u:1849: yajamānaḥ prastaro 'tra guṇo vā nāma vā stutiḥ /
GSP28mjnya01u:1858: kutaḥ - ' udbhidā yānena ' ityādāviva sāmānādhikaraṇyādityekaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP28mjnya01u:1860: tadāpi yajamānakārye japādau prastarasyācetanasya sāmarthyābhāvādguṇatvaṃ nāsti /
